snippet: Path found for spread of Alzheimer's, mortgage relief plan aims at refinancing, hardware supplies to keep on hand and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
abstract: Path found for spread of Alzheimer's, mortgage relief plan aims at refinancing, hardware supplies to keep on hand and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: A variety of consumer-focused articles appears daily in The New York Times and on our blogs. Each weekday morning, we gather them together here so you can quickly scan the news that could hit you in your wallet.

headline.main: Thursday Reading: Path Found For Spread of Alzheimer's
